Package chessview.pieces

Interface Piece

All Known Implementing Classes:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public interface Piece

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean isValidMove​(Position oldPosition, Position newPosition, Piece isTaken, Board board)
    Check whether or not a given move on a given board is valid.
    boolean isWhite()
    Determine whether this piece is white or black.

  • Method Details

    • isWhite

      boolean isWhite()
      Determine whether this piece is white or black. //@return

    • isValidMove

      boolean isValidMove​(Position oldPosition, Position newPosition, Piece isTaken, Board board)
      Check whether or not a given move on a given board is valid. For takes, the piece being taken must be supplied.
      Parameters:
      oldPosition - --- position of this piece before move.
      newPosition - --- position of this piece after move.
      isTaken - --- piece being taken, or null if no piece taken.
      board - --- board on which the validity of this move is being checked. //@return
